text: Hi all, I was directed here from the general channel

I'm currently a medical student with some background and interest in the blockchain. I wanted to get more information about how I can contribute to the counterfeit drug prevention use case from the Requirements WG. There was some mention of needing help in writing use cases in the April 21st meeting, but I just wanted to ask about what to do from there: <https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/Requirements-WG-Status-2016-Apr-21>

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...

text: <@U1246BT5J>:  Hi Vikram at this point the drug prevention use case was used as a usecase walk through to aid in better understand how the template for all the usecases should look, the template for the current consensus on how a use case should look is listed here, but its not witten in stone so use it more as a guideline to build off of at this point and ignore any part of it that doesnt make sense, just make sure to document where you'd like further clairty and bring it up at the next requriements meeting so it can be fixed moving forward

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...

text: since the drug use case is of intrest to you

<@U1246BT5J>:  what you can do is go to the use cases wiki, there are currently two use cases that are medical related, if you can think of another feel free to add it to the wiki as a use case.  <https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/Use-Cases>

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...

text: The two use cases that are medical that are currently listed are trial results and counterfit drug prevention and detection
If one or both are of intrest to you and you'd like to take ownership of working on it, add your name to the top of the use case name
What that means is you will be looking at the usecase template questions and answering them as it applies to this specific usecase

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...

text: What i mean by take ownership is this example, just put "Vikram Dillion will work on this" at the top
Feel free to reach out to me on skype anytime if you have additoinal questions, i myself need to be doing the same for a few usecases too so we can take a stab at filling out usecases together

Thank you very much. I'm actually thinking about trying to complete the clinical trials one. I actually wrote a grant to google a while back in the same area. That grant didn't get funded, but maybe some of the knowledge will transfer over
I've started editing the clinical trials use case, left a first draft and will continue to work on it through the week, hopefully will be done by Sunday
